title: Cod with spicy Puy lentils
ingredients: ['2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 celery sticks, chopped', '2 medium-sized leeks, chopped', '1–2 fresh red chillies, seeded and finely chopped', '170 g (6 oz) Puy lentils, rinsed and drained', '750 ml (1¼ pints) vegetable stock', '1 sprig of fresh thyme', '1 bay leaf', 'juice of 1 lemon', 'pinch of cayenne pepper', '4 pieces of skinless cod fillet or cod steaks, about 140 g (5 oz) each', 'salt and pepper', 'lemon wedges to serve']
